ValidationRule.description: If Client is Horizon and Customer ID starts with R, Group Plan Sponsor must be Horizon FEP or Community Support Program - NO COACH
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c , 'Horizon'), BEGINS(CustomerID__c, "R"),
NOT( Or( Group_PlanSponsor__c = "Horizon FEP", Group_PlanSponsor__c = "Community Support Program - NO COACH", Group_PlanSponsor__c = "Call Request" ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Client is Horizon and Customer ID starts with R, Group Plan Sponsor must be Horizon FEP or Community Support Program - NO COACH
